author: hwright
msg: While following up to r38273, I discovered a number of other issues with
(already_in_a_tree_conflict): Use a boolean output parameter, since none
of our callers actually uses the string output.  Use absolute paths
Update callers, include absolute path and output variable requirements.

author: hwright
msg: (svn_wc_status2): Take a step toward getting rid of access batons by directly
fetching an entry using the db/local_abspath pair.

author: hwright
msg: (record_mergeinfo_for_added_subtrees): Followup to r38331: get the directory
absolute path in a much simpler manner.

author: hwright
msg: (collect_ignore_patterns): Followup to r38259 by being a bit smarter

author: hwright
msg: Swap the order of a few parameters to better meet with convention.
